tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_information (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    savings_plan_signup_date TIMESTAMP,
    sign_up_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE savings_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    plan_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    plan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    plan_start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    signup_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE savings_plans (
    plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    plan_description TEXT,
    plan_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    plan_percentage DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    is_active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE customer_savings (
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    plan_id UUID REFERENCES savings_plans(plan_id),
    savings_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    sign_up_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE savings_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE customer_savings (
    customer_id INT,
    plan_id INT,
    subscription_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (customer_id, plan_id)
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    plan_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE rewards (
    reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    plan_id INT,
    reward_date DATE,
    reward_type VARCHAR(50)
)
